UnitType.Quote: "Crackle and bend, singe and smoke. This is the command I give to the land before me."
UnitType.Backstory: You are of the Sacred Flame and you worship Fire. Empowered in unity, you shall spread across the lands and burn. Forest, flesh, even the hills themselves must be spent to blackness. Only then will the hungering tongues within rest, only when all the waters are fog and the lands are ash.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: -99% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: "The secrets of the universe hide within flame. I guard these secrets, and smite my enemies with them."
UnitType.Backstory: Fafnir is a quiet king. He spends much of his time in contemplation and study. But his temper is quick, and in battle the fruit of his knowledge is clear: Fafnir commands fire effortlessly, and combined with his massive size and strength he is a power of almost no equal.

UnitType.Description: Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
UnitType.Backstory: You are of the Sacred Flame and you worship Fire. Empowered in unity, you shall spread across the lands and burn. Forest, flesh, even the hills themselves must be spent to blackness. Only then will the hungering tongues within rest, only when all the waters are fog and the lands are ash.

UnitType.Description: Sappers build Outposts and Primitive Roads.

UnitType.Description: Archers are lightly equipped and skilled at picking off their opponents at a distance.

UnitType.Description: Crossbowmen can fire through units in lines and are a great way to deal with masses of enemy units.

UnitType.Description: Slayers are the most expensive and powerful units that can be trained. They combine the best armor, weapons and enchanted items with reliable mounts and advanced training.

UnitType.Description: Swordsmen are great midgame units. Their swords leave a hand free for a shield and their counterattack ability allows them to strike back at enemies that attack them.
